thread.section_title: Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, New York City - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: BIt will be better when upgrade is completed
thread.title_full: BIt will be better when upgrade is completed - Review of Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Cid Y
title: BIt will be better when upgrade is completed
text:
LOTS OF CONSTRUCTION. I stayed 2 nights in the Downtown Marriott (newer larger rooms but no room service) and one night at Pulse. The rooms at Pulse are smaller and yet the rooftop bar and view made up for it. I would have preferred there had been no construction, which was very loud and slowed the use of the two elevators, but it was pre-disclosed, and I wanted to check it out, since I am a Vacation Club member, plus it is close to both major train stations.
Room Tip: I asked for a upper floor but those were being renovated, so Nope. See more room tips
